content.rendered:
Directed by Jibi Joju

Written by Jibi Joju

Cast Mohanlal (Ittymaani / Ittymaathan). Honey Rose (Jessy Pothen). Radhika Sarathkumar (Annamma Plamoottil). Siddique (Fr. John Paul). Swasika Vijay (Betty (as Swasika)). Johny Antony (Adv. Tharian). Aju Varghese (Sugunan). Madhuri Braganza (Young Theyyamma). K.P.A.C. Lalitha (Theyyamma). Salim Kumar (Maapranam Varkey). Krishna Prasad (Doctor). Hareesh Kanaran (Geogy Pothen). Antony Perumbavoor (Hospital attender). Sunil Sukhada (Priest). Kailash (Xavier). Dharmajan Bolgatty (Sainu). Rajesh Paravoor (Paulinos). Sreejith Ravi (Advocate Jerry Idikkula). Ashokan (Dr. Asif Moopan). Saju Navodaya (Bhaskaran). Sijoy Varghese (Alex). Anjana Appukuttan (Kurian’s Wife). Chali Pala (Ittymani’s Relative). Sekhar Menon (Achayan). Viviya Santh (Ajo’s Wife). Vinu Mohan (Ajo). Savithri Sreedharan (Inmate At Old Age Home). Sethu Lakshmi (Mother Superior). V. Suresh Thampanoor (Pranchi). Sarasa Balussery (Inmate At Old Age Home). Saju Kodiyan (Registrar). Nandhu (Roy Mathew). Niranjan Kannan (Young Ittymaani). Komal Sharma (Alex’s Wife). Yamuna (Jessy’s Mother)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Antony Perumbavoor

Production Aashirvad Cinema
